column4: i installed ubuntu on my other machine, it worked fine except that i had problems connecting to the internet; irc had a lag of several minutes and i couldn't access anything with firefox
yeah but... what could be wrong with it? i'm not that good with networking
I don't know. dhcp settings maybe
well, i tried with static ip and entered the ip i get by dhcp on this computer (same network cable) and i could access, but slow. Changing to automatic made no difference
